abstract: Wumart Stores plans to raise $213 million via a placement of shares to investors including the TPG-managed fund TPG Asia V, and will use the money to open new stores as well as possible acquisitions.
snippet: Wumart Stores plans to raise $213 million via a placement of shares to investors including the TPG-managed fund TPG Asia V, and will use the money to open new stores as well as possible acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: Wumart Stores plans to raise 1.65 billion Hong Kong dollars ($213 million) via a placement of shares to investors including the TPG-managed fund TPG Asia V L.P., and will use the money to open new stores as well as for possible acquisitions.

headline.main: Wumart Seeks $213 Million via Share Sales
